jason r tibbetts wrote:
> I'm planning to write a simple applet that will pop open a JFrame that
> contains the JUnit Swing UI. I think that junit.swingui.TestRunner looks
> like the logical place to get ideas from, but is there anything more
> ready-made, such as a JFrame implementation that hooks up all the
> relevant widgets?

I don't know of such a thing.
